summary: E-commerce site (Aurelie Fine Jewellery) with customer-facing home page category navigation and an admin panel (/admin) managed via Internet Identity permissions.
architectural_notes: Admin access uses Internet Identity permissions; admin panel is available at /admin.
Role-based UI: show admin navigation options only for admin users when logged in.
known_issues: Generated 'example images' were sent as base64 data strings and did not render/download properly for the user (needs proper image rendering/attachment approach).

existing_features.title: Add a horizontal, scrollable row of SMALL circular product category tiles directly below the site header on customer-facing pages. Each tile must render a category image inside a circle, with the category name displayed directly below the circle in bottle-green color.

Implement category-tile click behavior so that clicking a circular category tile navigates to the category’s configured URL. If no custom URL is configured for that category, default to the existing internal route `/category/<categorySlug>`.

Add an admin UI in the existing Admin Dashboard to manage the header category row items: upload/replace the circular image for each category and set/update the click-through URL for each category. The admin UI must save to the backend and reflect changes after save.

Update the authenticated user dropdown in the header to show an "Admin" menu item ONLY when the logged-in user is an admin. Clicking it must navigate to `/admin`. Non-admin users must not see the Admin option.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a horizontal scrollable row of small circular category images directly below the header, with category name text below in bottle-green color.
Allow admin to upload/update the circular category images and configure a click-through URL/link for each category item.
Show an 'Admin' option in the header drop-down only when logged in as an admin user.
Home page: add a horizontal scrollable product row per category showing all products for that category, with 2–3 products visible at once.

Add backend support for storing and retrieving admin-managed data for the header category row: per categorySlug, persist (1) the circular image (blob) and (2) a URL string used when the tile is clicked. Expose query methods for the frontend to read this data and shared admin-only methods to update it.
